name: Design Engineering Black Titanium Exhaust Heat Wrap with Lava Rock Technology - 2" x 25' - Pliable Exhaust Wrap Tape for Exhaust Pipes, Withstands 1800°F Direct Heat & 2500°F Intermittent Heat
short_description: Reduces under-hood heat by up to 50% for cooler performance and greater reliability. Lowers intake air temps, maintains high exhaust gas velocity, and prevents horsepower loss from extreme heat.
Made in the USA from premium lava rock fibers interwoven with fireproof materials. Features a proprietary weave that makes installation around bends and curves simple and secure.

Cuts down on heat soak to improve performance, lowers intake air temperatures, protects against burns, shields sensitive components, and reduces heat transfer through the firewall and floor for a cooler, safer ride.
Resists damage from chemicals, oil, and vibration for long-term durability.
Withstands continuous direct heat up to 1800°F and intermittent spikes up to 2500°F for unmatched protection and durability.
product_description: Wrapping exhaust piping is crucial for controlling exhaust temperatures and reducing radiant under-hood heat by up to 50%, keeping exhaust gases hotter within the system decreases density and increases flow, improving exhaust scavenging, system efficiency, and reducing intake temperatures for increased horsepower gains. Made from pulverized lava rock, stranded into fiber material, and then woven into a tight weave, it handles more heat than typical fiberglass. Stronger and more durable than other wraps, DEI's titanium wrap withstands direct heat up to 1800°F and radiant heat up to 2500°F. A US manufacturer with 30 years of expertise in innovative heat and sound control products, DEI's products enhance performance and provide superior protection across automotive, marine, power sports, and industrial applications.

name: Deecam Exhaust Heat Wrap, 2'' x 16.5' Black Fiberglass Heat Resistant Exhaust Wrap Roll for Motorcycle, Car Exhaust Pipe Heat Insulation Muffler Tape with 10 Stainless Locking Ties
short_description: Excellent Material: Deecam exhaust heat wrap is made of high quality fiberglass, which is resistant to high and low temperatures, and can withstand high temperatures up to 1112°F（600℃）. Compared with other materials, exhaust wrap has low thermal conductivity, is resistant to wear and tear, and has a longer service life.

Protective Role: Black Exhaust wrap can solve the issues of engine and exhaust pipe temperature. Heat shield tape reduces the heat dissipation of exhaust gases and improves the efficiency of exhaust gas reuse. Exhaust tape high temp reduces the heat emission under the hood by 50%, plays a role in preventing high temperatures from damaging the engine, power cables and piping and other surrounding components. Exhaust wraps can also reduce noise and prevent burns.

Quick Installation: It is recommended to wear gloves during the installation process and soak the header wrap in water to improve adhesion, then wrap the high temp exhaust wrap completely around the exhaust pipe and secure heat wrap with stainless steel ties with locking steel beads to complete the installation easily.

Wide Range of Use: The exhaust header wrap is made of fiberglass yarn with excellent flexibility for tight and safe wrapping. The exhaust tape is highly resistant to abrasion, oil spills, high temperatures and vibration damage. Heat wrap for exhaust pipes can be used to insulate gas water heater exhaust pipes and domestic gas pipes, wrap outdoor pipes, insulate and soundproof exhaust pipes of motorcycles, cars, tractors and trucks.

Kit Package: 1 roll of 2'' x 16.5' motorcycle exhaust wrap and 10 stainless steel self-locking cable ties. This header wrap kit is enough for you to wrap your motorcycle exhaust pipe, and the stainless steel ties can be easily tightened.

name: Exhaust Heat Shield Automotive 16" x 78.7", Embossed Aluminum Heat Shield Kit with 20PCS Cable Metal Ties for Muffler Exhaust Wrap, Heat Barrier,Car Exhaust Sheet
short_description: PRODUCT SIZE: Heat shield automotive's size is 16“ x 78.7”, which is made of high quality heavy-duty embossed aluminum material, the thickness is 0.5 mm, it is flexible and can be bent at will, easy to cut and use.

GOOD HEAT RESISTANCE: Aluminum heat shield is a material with good heat resistance and can withstand sustained high temperatures up to 1022°F. Ideal for use in automobile chassis, muffler exhaust ducts, and automobile exhaust hoods for thermal protection.

RELIABLE MATERIAL: Made of insulated aluminum sheet material, car heat shield has good thermal insulation, effective protection of parts and components, suitable for mufflers, chassis, fuel tanks, catalytic converters and so on. More durable and better heat insulation compared to ordinary heat shield cloth.

ALL IN ONE KIT: Aluminum heat shield kit includes one roll of heat shield, 20PCS metal stainless steel ties - 12 inches long. NOTE: Please pay attention to the sharp edges of the product when removing or installing, it is better to wear gloves.

MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS: Exhaust heat shield are perfect for motorcycle mufflers, car undercarriages, fuel tank insulation, heavy duty industrial piping, firewalls and more. All you need to do is trim the aluminum sheet to the desired size and hammer it into shape to meet your various needs.

name: Titanium Pipe Shield with Gloves, Exhaust Heat Shield 12" x 6", 2 Layer Motorcycle Exhaust Heat Shield, Muffler Heat Shield Exhaust Wrap Pipe Heat Insulation Protection up to 1350°F
short_description: Heat Resistant: The motorcycle exhaust heat shield's 2 layer insulation consisting of titanium and silica fabricc effectively reduces exhaust pipe temperatures, minimizing the risk of feet burns, and can withstand temperatures up to 1,350°F, making it safer and more reliable than all-stainless steel motorcycle heat shield.

Humanization: The exhaust wrap heat shield matching gloves protect against fiberglass, providing a more comfortable use experience. The muffler heat shield uses directly stamped square holes to avoid tearing and breaking like rivets, ensuring durability and ensures that the exhaust surroundings remain within a safe temperature range.

Heat Insulation: Titanium Pipe Shield features stainless steel adjustable ties to ensure that the ties will not loosen once tightened. The gap between the heat shield and the tie improves heat dissipation and cooling, nice addition to any motorcycle or fourwheeler.

Superior Protection: The pipe heat insulation shield measuring 12" x 6" inches and customized for exhausts, it also protects exhausts from moisture and rust, solves contact problems between exhausts and legs, and reliably protects spare tires at the same time.

Easy Installation: The installation process is simple and quick, bend the heat shield according to the exhaust pipe shape and tighten the straps with a wrench. Ensure the exhaust pipe diameter is within the 3.5" range for optimal effectiveness.
